SELECT m.id as meiwenId, m.type, m.title, m.summary, m.cover_img_url, m.browse_count, m.collect_count, c.collect as is_collect, m.comment_count, m.create_time, m.update_time, u.user_id, u.username, u.photo_url FROM meiwen m LEFT JOIN jj_user u ON m.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN mw_collect c ON m.id = c.meiwen_id AND c.user_id = #{userId} order by m.create_time desc
LIMIT #{m},#{n}
